flows.title: Flow Management
flows.description: Create and manage your workflow processes

flowEditor.title: Flow Editor
flowEditor.plannerRequired: Planner destination must be configured before saving the flow. Please open Settings and configure a Microsoft Planner plan and bucket.
flowEditor.deleteFlowWarningMessage: This flow has not been saved with planner configuration. Do you want to delete this flow or continue editing?

nodeTypeDescriptions.convergence: Merge multiple paths after parallel node

flowEditor.edgeEditDescription: Customize the edge style and label

hints.dragNodes: Drag nodes from the palette to add them
hints.clickNodes: Click nodes to configure inputs and settings
hints.clickEdges: Click edges to change their style and add labels
hints.convergenceNote: Note: Convergence nodes need no configuration

flowEditor.deadlineHelp: Set default deadline for all items (days after creation)
flowEditor.deadlineInputFieldHelp: Choose which date input field to use as the base for deadline calculations
flowEditor.deadlineSummaryText: Tasks will be due {days} days after the {field} date

deadlines.title: Deadline Management
deadlines.help: Set deadline offsets for date columns. Tasks will be due X days after the date value in each column.
deadlines.singleHelp: Choose one date column and set how many days after that date the deadline should be.
deadlines.noDateColumns: No date columns available. Add date input fields to your flow nodes to set deadlines.
deadlines.selectColumnPlaceholder: Choose a date column for deadlines
deadlines.daysDescription: Items will be due this many days after the date in the selected column
deadlines.summaryText: Deadlines will be set to {{days}} days after the date in "{{column}}"

nodes.label: Label
nodes.noInputFields: This node had no input fields to complete
nodes.choiceMade: This was the choice made when the conditional node was completed

items.title: Flow Items
items.parallelWorkInfo: You can work on multiple parallel paths simultaneously. Each path can be completed independently.
items.noMatchingItems: No items match the current filters
items.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete item?
items.removeColumnsHint: Remove columns that are no longer needed ({count} columns)
items.addNodeFieldsHint: Add node field columns to manage them here
items.selectNodeInputFieldHint: Select a node input field to display as a column
items.addInputsHint: Add input fields to your nodes in the flow editor to create columns
items.addNewItemHint: Create a new item to start the flow
items.clickNextNodeToProceed: Node completed - Click next node to proceed
items.notAuthorizedToComplete: You are not authorized to complete this node

hints.pinchDrag: Pinch to zoom, drag to pan

items.notifyMessage: I've completed "{completed}"; open the flow at step: "{target}"
items.plannerNotConfigured: Planner destination not configured for this flow. Open Settings > Planner Destination to pick a Plan and Bucket.
items.assignResponsibleDescription: The following nodes need to be assigned to specific users before proceeding:
items.assignAtLeastOneUser: Please assign at least one user to each step

planner.bucketRequired: Select a bucket before saving the flow

groups.title: Group Management
groups.description: Create and manage groups of users responsible for completing tasks
groups.noGroupsMessage: Create groups first in the Group Management section
groups.selectGroupToEdit: Select a group to edit or create a new one
groups.searchUsers: Search for users in your organization...
groups.searchUsersDescription: Search and select users from your Teams organization
groups.teamsIntegrationDescription: Group management requires Microsoft Teams integration to search and manage users from your organization.
groups.teamsLoginRequired: Please log in with Teams to access group management features.
groups.teamsLoginToEnableFeatures: Log in with Teams to enable user search and notifications
groups.deleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
groups.atLeastOneMemberRequired: Please add at least one member to the group
groups.validEmailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
groups.userAlreadyAdded: This user is already added to the group
groups.saveGroupFailed: Failed to save group. Please try again.
groups.deleteGroupFailed: Failed to delete group. Please try again.
groups.loginToSendNotifications: Please log in with Teams to send notifications
groups.notificationFailed: Failed to send notifications. Please try again.
groups.notificationMessage: You have been assigned a new task in the Flow Creator application. Please check your assigned workflows.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.selectPath: Please select a path to continue
validation.atLeastOneGroup: At least one responsible group is required

convergence.waitingForPaths: Waiting for other paths to complete
